powerup.passExp: You can move the cup without saying anything.
powerup.shakeExp: You can drop the cup, whether you already pressed 'drop'.
powerup.xrayExp: You can see one dice but you don't know which one of the 2 dices is it.
powerup.transferExp: If you get damage, you or someone else can get damage.
powerup.changeExp: You can change the number someone said before. So if he said 65, the new number will be generated between 31 and 65
powerup.doubleExp: Someone gets double damage except you.
powerup.reverseExp: If I press 'reveal' and I have to get damage, because it's the truth, I wont get damage but the player, who said the truth, gets damaga. But if I press 'reveal' and the previous player has to get damage, because it's a lie, I will get damage and the previous player wont.
powerup.helperExp: You get a 3. dice and you can replace it with the other dices.
